message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but I also need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for the value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This price still represents a significant value for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  Let's see if we can agree on this.
